snippet.title: Raven: The Untold Story of the Rev. Jim Jones and His People
snippet.description: This widely sought work is restored to print after many years with a new preface by the author, as well as the more than sixty-five rare photographs from the original volume.

snippet.title: Mind of the Raven
snippet.description: At the heart of this book are Heinrich's love and respect for these complex and engaging creatures, and through his keen observation and analysis, we become their intimates too.

snippet.title: The Dream Thieves
